mapper.select: SELECT user_no, user_id, user_pass, first_name, last_name, role_name, enabled, DATE_FORMAT(regist_date, '%Y-%m-%d') regist_date, DATE_FORMAT(certification_date, '%Y-%m-%d') certification_date FROM members WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (user_id, user_pass, first_name, last_name, role_name, enabled, regist_date, certification_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, 'USER', 'N', NOW(), null)
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET enabled = 'Y', certification_date = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId}
